check_box.label: Enable teleporting via double-click in-world
check_box.tool_tip: Double-clicking on an object/person will teleport you to that location.
check_box.name: double_click_teleport_check

check_box.label: Reset camera after teleporting
check_box.tool_tip: Centers the camera behind you after a local teleport.
check_box.name: center_after_teleport_check

check_box.label: Offset TP target by half agent height
check_box.tool_tip: Tries to aim the TP so that your feet land at the point you're aiming for.
check_box.name: offset_teleport_check

check_box.label: Preview animations on the avatar instead on a dummy before uploading
check_box.tool_tip: The Animation upload window will play animations on your avatar when previewing them.
check_box.name: preview_anim_in_world_check

check_box.label: Save scripts in inventory as Mono scripts instead of LSL2
check_box.tool_tip: Scripts will automatically be compiled in Mono when saving - Usually only possible when placed in an object.
check_box.name: save_scripts_as_mono_check

check_box.label: Always rez objects as land group when available
check_box.tool_tip: Rez objects with the same group that the object is being rezzed on has, regardless of your active tag.
check_box.name: always_rez_in_group_check

check_box.label: Always show Build as enabled
check_box.tool_tip: Allows you to use the Build menu without having to be tricky about it. May not mean you can actually build there.
check_box.name: always_build_check

check_box.label: Always allow Fly
check_box.tool_tip: Lets you fly in locations you shouldn't be allowed to. Use at your own risk - Just because you can doesn't mean you should.
check_box.name: always_fly_check

check_box.label: Disable camera minimum distance
check_box.tool_tip: Allows the camera to get reeeaaally close to things.
check_box.name: disable_camera_zoom_check

check_box.label: Enable Power User functionality
check_box.tool_tip: Adds features deemed too dangerous for normal use. These features can wreak havoc or do bad things if misused - Mostly to yourself or your belongings. If you're sure, activate the checkbox below as well.
check_box.name: power_user_check

check_box.label: Confirm Power User functionality
check_box.tool_tip: Confirms Power User activation. Turn this on at your own risk, and use any features it enables responsibly. Voodoo devs won't replace anything you break. We recommend having a backup copy of anything to be victim to these powers. Unlike most checkboxes, you must click Apply or OK before this will activate.
check_box.name: power_user_confirm_check

check_box.label: Enable Ascent System Inventory (Requires Restart)
check_box.tool_tip: Creates a new folder in the inventory for storing settings files and non-permanent assets.
check_box.name: system_folder_check

check_box.label: Temporary uploads go in the System Asset folder.
check_box.tool_tip: Puts temporary uploads in the Asset folder which separates them from actual uploads, making them easier to find.
check_box.name: temp_in_system_check

check_box.label: Automatically fetch the inventory in the background after login
check_box.tool_tip: Inventory will preload when you log in, so you don't have to wait for it to load when doing an initial search.
check_box.name: fetch_inventory_on_login_check

check_box.label: Enable speed-rezzing via draw distance stepping
check_box.name: speed_rez_check
check_box.tool_tip: When active, this will progressively increase your draw distance, which allows closer objects/people to rez first.

panel.label: Command Line
panel.name: Command Line

check_box.label: Enable usage of chat bar as a command line
check_box.name: chat_cmd_toggle

panel.text: Teleport within sim (usage: cmd x y z)

slider.name: AscentPlatformSize
slider.label: Default width:
slider.tool_tip: How big do you want the platform to be?

line_editor.tool_tip: Clears the Chat History to prevent lag effects from chat spammers.
line_editor.name: AscentCmdLineClearChat

panel.text: Get avatar name from key (usage: cmd key)
Offer teleport to avatar (usage: cmd key)
Teleport to sim x (usage: cmd simname)

line_editor.tool_tip: The syntax of this command allows partial names and is not case sensitive. Better results if used while the Radar is open.
line_editor.name: AscentCmdLineTP2

check_box.label: Broadcast Viewer Effects (Does not include beams)
check_box.name: broadcast_viewer_effects

check_box.label: Disable Point At And Beam
check_box.tool_tip: Don't point at or show your edit beam when selecting an object.
check_box.name: disable_point_at_and_beams_check

check_box.label: Do not Look At objects (defeats ShowLookAt)
check_box.tool_tip: Turns off broadcasting headturns and lookat beacons for yourself.
check_box.name: private_look_at_check

check_box.label: Show others' LookAt beacons
check_box.tool_tip: Shows you where others are looking.
check_box.name: show_look_at_check

check_box.label: Auto detach LSL Bridge
check_box.tool_tip: Automatically detach LSL Bridge of Phoenix or Firestorm viewer.
check_box.name: detach_bridge

check_box.label: Quiet Snapshots to Disk
check_box.tool_tip: Doesn't make a camera sound nor alert everyone when you take a snapshot to your computer.
check_box.name: quiet_snapshots_check

check_box.label: On standing up, revoke perms for the object your avatar was sitting on
check_box.tool_tip: Objects generally retain Take Control and Trigger Animation permissions until reset or given permission by another user. Enabling this will make sure you revoke these permissions immediately.
check_box.name: revoke_perms_on_stand_up_check

check_box.label: Disable click-to-sit objects
check_box.tool_tip: Some griefer tools rely on forcing or tricking you to click on an object that will make you sit, giving the object automatic permissions to trigger animations amongst other things. This will disable llSitTarget - It does mean that you will need to select 'Sit' on poseballs and furniture.
check_box.name: disable_click_sit_check

check_box.label: Display Total Script Count changes:
check_box.name: totalscriptjumps
check_box.tool_tip: Displays script count changes in your region, dependant on the threshold you choose to the right.

spinner.name: ScriptJumpCount
spinner.tool_tip: Threshold for the script jump message [Default: 100]

check_box.label: Values are percent
check_box.tool_tip: Default settings are Percentages and every axis set at 50
check_box.name: EmPivotPercToggle

check_box.label: Copy permission
check_box.tool_tip: Next owner can make copies of creations
check_box.name: next_owner_copy

check_box.label: Modify permission
check_box.tool_tip: Next owner can edit creations
check_box.name: next_owner_modify

check_box.label: Transfer permission
check_box.tool_tip: Next owner can give(or sell) creations
check_box.name: next_owner_transfer

combo_box.name: combobox shininess
combo_box.tool_tip: Set the amount of shine for the object

check_box.name: EmeraldBuildPrefsEmbedItem
check_box.label: Put an item into new objects
Axis arrow on root prim position
check_box.tool_tip: Default behaviour is to show the axis on the center of mass of a linkset. If enabled, the axis will be shown on the root prim of the linkset instead.
check_box.name: EmBuildPrefsActualRoot_toggle
